statements: SELECT * FROM Users;
SELECT username, access_level FROM Users WHERE access_level > 5;
SELECT user_id, username FROM Users WHERE access_level = 3 ORDER BY user_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM Users WHERE username LIKE '%admin%';
SELECT user_id, username, access_level FROM Users WHERE access_level IS NOT NULL ORDER BY username ASC;
SELECT * FROM Users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT username,password FROM Users WHERE access_level > 2 ORDER BY user_id DESC;
SELECT user_id, username FROM Users WHERE access_level = 1 AND username LIKE 'A%' ORDER BY user_id ASC;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_users FROM Users WHERE access_level = 3;
SELECT * FROM Users WHERE access_level IN (1, 3) ORDER BY username ASC, user_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM Users;
SELECT user_id, username FROM Users WHERE permissions = 'admin';
SELECT username, permissions FROM Users ORDER BY username DESC;
SELECT COUNT(*) as total_users FROM Users;
SELECT * FROM Permissions WHERE permission_name = 'read';
SELECT * FROM Users WHERE user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT username, permissions FROM Users WHERE username LIKE 'J%';
SELECT * FROM Users WHERE permissions = 'admin' ORDER BY username DESC;
SELECT user_id, username, permission_name FROM Users JOIN Permissions ON Users.permissions = Permissions.permission_name;
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM Users WHERE permissions = 'user';
SELECT * FROM Users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT username, access_level FROM Users WHERE access_level > 1;
SELECT permission_name FROM AccessPermissions ORDER BY permission_name DESC;

SELECT Users.username, AccessPermissions.permission_name FROM Users JOIN UserAccess ON Users.user_id = UserAccess.user_id JOIN AccessPermissions ON UserAccess.permission_id = AccessPermissions.permission_id;
SELECT user_id, COUNT(permission_id) AS num_permissions FROM UserAccess GROUP BY user_id HAVING num_permissions > 1;
SELECT * FROM Users;
SELECT username, access_level FROM Users WHERE access_level > 1 ORDER BY username DESC;
SELECT u.username, p.permission_name FROM Users u JOIN UserAccess ua ON u.user_id = ua.user_id JOIN AccessPermissions p ON ua.permission_id = p.permission_id;
SELECT u.username, p.permission_name FROM Users u LEFT JOIN UserAccess ua ON u.user_id = ua.user_id LEFT JOIN AccessPermissions p ON ua.permission_id = p.permission_id WHERE ua.permission_id IS NULL;
SELECT u.username, COUNT(ua.permission_id) AS num_permissions FROM Users u JOIN UserAccess ua ON u.user_id = ua.user_id GROUP BY u.username HAVING num_permissions > 1 ORDER BY num_permissions DESC;
SELECT * FROM Users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT username, access_level FROM Users WHERE access_level > 2;
SELECT username, password FROM Users WHERE username = 'alice';
SELECT * FROM Users ORDER BY username DESC;
SELECT u.username, ur.role_name, up.permission_name FROM Users u JOIN UserRolesPermissions urp ON u.user_id = urp.role_id JOIN UserPermissions up ON urp.permission_id = up.permission_id;
SELECT * FROM Users WHERE access_level > 1;
SELECT user_id, username FROM Users WHERE username LIKE 'A%';
SELECT username, access_level FROM Users ORDER BY access_level DESC, username ASC;

SELECT Users.username, UserRoles.role_name FROM Users INNER JOIN UserRolesPermissions ON Users.user_id = UserRolesPermissions.role_id INNER JOIN UserRoles ON UserRolesPermissions.role_id = UserRoles.role_id;
SELECT Users.username, COUNT(*) AS num_permissions FROM Users INNER JOIN UserRolesPermissions ON Users.user_id = UserRolesPermissions.role_id GROUP BY Users.username HAVING num_permissions > 2;
SELECT * FROM Users;
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM Users WHERE role='admin';
SELECT user_id, email, role FROM Users WHERE username='john_doe';
SELECT * FROM Permissions ORDER BY permission_id DESC;
SELECT username, role FROM Users INNER JOIN UserRoles ON Users.user_id = UserRoles.user_id WHERE Users.role='admin';
SELECT * FROM Users
SELECT username, email FROM Users WHERE role = 'admin'
SELECT user_id, email FROM Users WHERE user_id = 1
SELECT * FROM Permissions LEFT JOIN Users ON Permissions.user_id = Users.user_id
SELECT Users.username, Roles.role_name FROM Users JOIN UserRoles ON Users.user_id = UserRoles.user_id JOIN Roles ON UserRoles.role_id = Roles.role_id
